Description: Software in the meter (except metrological software) and communication device should be upgradeable from HES.

Feature: Communication metadata to be delivered continuously
Description: Communication method data (15-minute values) should be delivered continuously from the communication equipment to HES.

Feature: 1-phase and 3-phase measurement should meet the Metering Parameters according to MID
Description:
1-phase and 3-phase measurement should (S82) meet the meter parameters according to MID:
- Class index = B (or better)
- Minimum current (Imin) = 0.25 A (or lower)
- Reference current (In) = 5 A
- Maximum current (Imax) = 85 A (or higher) (including circuit breaker function)
